m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Deutsche Bank AG Aiming To Boost Green Bonds Investment To €1 Billion March 4th, 2015 by James Ayre   Deutsche Bank AG is aiming to boost its investment into green bonds from €200 million ($224 million) where it stand now to over €1 billion ($1.121 billion), according to recent reports. The move will follow on the heels of similar ones by the bank’s competitor’s, Barclays and Citigroup .
